data.eml:eml: Neocrassocoris, a new apterous genus of Carventinae from China (Heteroptera: Aradidae)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Bai, Xiaoshuan, Heiss, Ernst, Cai, Wanzhi (2019): Neocrassocoris, a new apterous genus of Carventinae from China (Heteroptera: Aradidae). Zootaxa 4612 (1): 95-102, DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4612.1.6
